content.1: Except the LORD build the house, they labour in vain that build it: except the LORD keep the city, the watchman waketh but in vain.
content.3: Lo, children are an heritage of the LORD : and the fruit of the womb is his reward.
content.4: As arrows are in the hand of a mighty man; so are children of the youth.
content.5: Happy is the man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.

titles.1: A Song of degrees for Solomon.
